DataElement.preferredName: Cigarette Smoke Exposure Past 30 Days Daily Quantity Hour Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response about how many hours per day they have been exposed to other people's cigarette smoke in an enclosed location.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cigarette Smoke Exposure Past 30 Days Daily Quantity Hour
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Environmental, occupational or consumer-based exposure to airborne gases and particulates produced by direct or nearby use of a cigarette._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._Occurring or done each day._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
